Class ArduinoViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • ArduinoViewer

  • public class ArduinoViewer
extends Application
    This was created using the example from the Apress book JavaFX8 Introduction by example and adding functionality. This application provides the user the ability to view photos that are loaded from the Arduino and also any other image file that is desired

    Instructions:

    1. Drag and drop an image file onto the application window. 2. Repeat step 1 so more than 2 images are loaded. 3. Click the left and right arrow controls to advance.

    Author:
    Jacob Christensen

      • addImage

        private void addImage(String url)
        private method addImage - Adds the URL string representation of the path to the image file. Based on a URL the method will check if it matches supported image format.
        Parameters:
        url - string representation of the path to the image file.

      • gotoImageIndex

        private int gotoImageIndex(ArduinoViewer.ButtonMove direction)
        private method gotoImageIndex - returns the next index in the list of files to go to the next image
        Parameters:
        direction - PREV and NEXT to move backward or forward in the list of pictures.
        Returns:
        int the index to the previous or next picture to be shown.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • loadImage

        private void loadImage(String url)
        private method loadImage - This method does the following loads an image, updates a progress bar and spawns a new thread. If another process is already loading the method will return without loading.
        Parameters:
        url - string representation of the path to the image file.
